text: OK, here is a link to a charity that could help you

resource.Name: No Panic
resource.Description: Voluntary charity offering support for sufferers of panic attacks and OCD. Offers a course to help overcome your phobia/OCD. Includes a helpline.

text: Here is a link to some experts who can help you deal with debt

resource.Name: StepChange
resource.Description: Debt experts help over 620,000 people a year to deal with their debt problems.

resource.Name: SANEline
resource.Description: Emotional support, information and guidance for people affected by mental illness, their families and carers.

resource.Description: Promotes the views and needs of people with mental health problems.

text: Here is a link to an OCD charity,run by people with OCD

resource.Name: OCD UK
resource.Description: A charity run by people with OCD, for people with OCD. Includes facts, news and treatments.

text: OK, here is a useful link

resource.Name: OCD Action
resource.Description: Support for people with obsessive compulsive disorder (OCD). Includes information on treatment and online resources.

resource.Name: FamilyLine
resource.Description: Providing information, advice, guidance and support on any aspect of parenting and family life, including bullying.

text: Here is a useful resource for children and adolescents

resource.Name: YoungMinds
resource.Description: Information on child and adolescent mental health. Services for parents and professionals.
